scripts.build:wrapper: npm i && cd ../../../packages/components && npm i && npm run build:stencil && npm link && cd ../components-vue && npm i && npm link @infineon/infineon-design-system-stencil && npm run build
scripts.link: cd ../../../packages/components-vue && npm link && cd ../../examples/wrapper-components/vue-javascript && npm link @infineon/infineon-design-system-vue
